title: Mixing of left square bracket [ and right bracket ) in comments i.e., range [0, NumMethod())
body:
by **rounin.urashima**: 
Mixing of left square bracket [ and right bracket ) in comments i.e., range [0,
NumMethod())

rounin@gomachine:~/go$ time grep -n "range \[\0" `find . -name "*"`
|grep ")"
./src/pkg/strconv/atof.go:12://   2) Multiply/divide decimal by powers of two until in
range [0.5, 1)
./src/pkg/strconv/atof.go:172:	// Scale by powers of two until in range [0.5, 1.0)
./src/pkg/sort/search.go:10:// in [0, n) at which f(i) is true, assuming that on the
range [0, n), 
./src/pkg/sort/search.go:12:// f is false for some (possibly empty) prefix of the input
range [0, n)
./src/pkg/sort/search.go:15:// Search calls f(i) only for i in the range [0, n).
./src/pkg/reflect/type.go:43:	// It panics if i is not in the range [0, NumMethod()).
./src/pkg/reflect/type.go:135:	// It panics if i is not in the range [0, NumField()).
./src/pkg/reflect/type.go:155:	// It panics if i is not in the range [0, NumIn()).
./src/pkg/reflect/type.go:180:	// It panics if i is not in the range [0, NumOut()).
./src/pkg/time/time.go:845:		return nil, errors.New("Time.MarshalJSON: year outside
of range [0,9999]")
./src/pkg/time/time_test.go:841:	{Date(10000, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, UTC),
"Time.MarshalJSON: year outside of range [0,9999]"},
./src/pkg/time/time_test.go:842:	{Date(-1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, UTC),
"Time.MarshalJSON: year outside of range [0,9999]"},
./src/pkg/index/suffixarray/suffixarray_test.go:143:			t.Errorf("test %q, lookup
%q, result %d (n = %d): index %d out of range [0, %d[", tc.name, s, i, n, r,
len(tc.source))
./src/pkg/math/rand/rand.go:11:// pseudo-random int64 values in the range [0,
1<<63).
./test/range.go:274:	for *getvar(&i), *getvar(&v) = range [0]int{} {

real	0m0.733s
user	0m0.290s
sys	0m0.140s
rounin@gomachine:~/go$ hg identify
96bd78e7d35e weekly/weekly.2012-02-22
rounin@gomachine:~/go$ date
Sat Feb 25 17:03:32 GMT 2012
